articles.description: The Bulls hit three 3-pointers in the final 12.6 seconds of the game to get the win.
articles.content:
NBA: Los Angeles Lakers at Chicago Bulls
The Lakers had this one. They led 115-110 with 12.6 seconds left until a Patrick Williams 3-pointer had the Bulls down just two. Then Chicago stole the inbou… [+1167 chars]
